PageTitle: shutdown (VPN instance MSDP view/MSDP view of a public network instance)
FuncDef:
The shutdown command terminates a specified Multicast Source Discovery Protocol (MSDP) peer.
The undo shutdown command restores the default configuration. The shutdown command terminates a specified Multicast Source Discovery Protocol (MSDP) peer. The undo shutdown command restores the default configuration. By default, the MSDP peers are not closed after the peer relationship is established.
ParentView: VPN instance MSDP view,MSDP view of a public network instance

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address of an MSDP peer.
The address is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo: The shutdown command can be used to close the TCP connection between two MSDP peers whereas keep the MSDP peer relationship.
